| HistoryText             = The '''Bombshells''' are a group of radical leftist students who attempted to assassinate [[Ariella Conner (Earth-616)|Ariella Conner]] as she gave a guest lecture on the topic of border security at [[Empire State University]]; however, Ariella's life was saved by [[Joaquín Torres (Earth-616)|Falcon]], who was also in attendance to protest Ms. Conner's political positions.

The Bombshells were ultimately taken into custody by the [[New York City Police Department (Earth-616)|NYPD]] after their attack was thwarted by [[Elvin Haliday (Earth-616)|Rage]] with the help of Falcon and [[Redwing (Earth-616)|Redwing]].{{r|Captain America: Sam Wilson Vol 1 17}}

| Equipment               = 
| Transportation          = 
| Weapons                 = Grenades and other explosive devices.


| Trivia                  = *The Bombshells were created to spoof oversensitive college students. They also use phrases commonly used by college students like "trigger warning" and "safe space". The characters themselves are controversial, primarily due to being seen as a "Strawman argument".
